name: MLCLSTMResultMode
desc: Constants that describe the result of an LSTM layer.

items.name: case output
items.desc: A result mode that indicates the layer produces a single result tensor that represents the final output of the LSTM.

items.name: case outputAndStates
items.desc: A result mode that indicates the layer produces three result tensors that represent the final output of the LSTM, the last hidden state, and the cell state.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual description of the LSTM result mode you use for debugging.
